title: The Transformation Scenario
prompt: A weathered wooden table in a rural community center or church basement, scattered with maps, planning documents, and handwritten notes about healthcare infrastructure, photographed from above in soft afternoon light filtering through old windows; the composition emphasizes the tangible work of community organizing and long-term planning, with hands and forearms of people engaged in discussion partially visible at the table edges, the overall tone earthy and contemplative, shot in documentary style that conveys the deliberate, unglamorous labor of systemic transformation.
